nodes.text: The Hoth Republic Orbital Station was a space station that orbited the planet Hoth during the Cold War and the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

The Hoth Republic Orbital Station was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. It serves as the spaceport for Republic players for the planet Hoth, and can only be accessed by Republic players with their own ship. Players then can take a shuttle down to Aurek Base on the planet's surface.
